page.title: 15Four Oaks - Clubs
page.content: Memberships of clubs,societies and other organisations is still a major feature of life for many people of all ages.Sporting clubs are the most popular especially for young adults,with golf club membership being the top choice.An additional attraction here is the social activity connected with such clubs. Organisations aimed at young people are numerous and very popular.The scout and guide movements with their branches for young children are enthusiastically supported.Church choirs mostly struggle to maintain viable numbers but the acceptancce of girl choristers has saved some choirs from disbandment.Youth clubs remain popular,although their appeal to some teenagers is not as strong as hitherto.Clubs exist to cater for the minor interests of local people.
